title: Theresa May – 2018 Speech in Belfast
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, in Belfast on 20 July 2018.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)
